alert.note: Alert for Eastern Cochise County Below 5000 Feet including Douglas, Willcox (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 22 at 4:56PM MST until February 22 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MST THIS EVENING... ...HIGH WIND WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...West winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...Eastern Cochise County below 5000 feet. * WHEN...High Wind Warning expires at 5 PM MST. Wind Advisory remains in effect until 8 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Cochise County Below 5000 Feet including Douglas, Willcox
